message.content: This question requires an understanding of how parakeets communicate. Parakeets are known to communicate with each other through squawks. Option (A) is the correct answer because squawking is a vocalization that parakeets use to communicate with each other. Options (B), (C), and (D) are incorrect because shrugs, seeds, and notes are not known modes of communication for parakeets.
